headline: Rare Earth Boom: Defense Heavyweight Joins Critical Mineral Effort
summary: REalloys Inc. appoints GM Defense president Stephen S. duMont as non-executive chairman to align commercial growth with allied defense modernization and secure critical mineral supply chains.

raw.headline: Rare Earth Boom: Defense Heavyweight Joins Critical Mineral Effort
raw.summary: REalloys Inc. appoints GM Defense president Stephen S. duMont as non-executive chairman to align commercial growth with allied defense modernization and secure critical mineral supply chains.

headline: Fuerte Announces Key Management Team Additions to Advance Its Coffee Gold Project
summary: Vancouver, British Columbia--(Newsfile Corp. - October 20, 2025) - Fuerte Metals Corporation (TSXV: FMT) (OTCQB: FUEMF) ("Fuerte" or the "Company") is pleased to announce several key additions to its management team as the Company begins work on its newly-acquired Coffee Gold project ("Coffee") in the Yukon. The new additions to the senior leadership team include:Denis Flood as Chief Operating Officer ("COO")Jason O'Connell as Chief Financial Officer ("CFO")Jennie Gjertsen as Vice-President...

headline: Newmont: Think Twice Before You Jump In Right Now
summary: Newmont stock has delivered a stellar 63% 1-year total return, benefiting from surging gold prices and strong operating leverage. Read the latest analysis on gold stocks here.
